entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
